statements: DELETE FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123456789' AND amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM block_transactions WHERE block_id = 100 AND transaction_id = 200;
DELETE FROM block_addresses WHERE balance <= 0 AND address_id IN (SELECT address_id FROM block_addresses WHERE address = '123 Main Street');
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE block_number = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM transaction_inputs WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND sender_address = '0xABC123DEF';
DELETE FROM block_headers WHERE block_id = 500 AND miner_address = '0x123abc';
